about.title: Hi, I'm a Full Stack Developer
about.description: I specialize in building web applications using the MERN stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. and also other Techs such as PHP, Laravel , I have a passion for creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications.

allExperience.companyDescription: I completed an intensive bootcamp focused on Full Stack Web Development, emphasizing the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Through daily mentorship from senior Tech Leads, I gained hands-on experience, evident in executing various Full Stack projects. Specializing in front-end and back-end development, I excel in crafting seamless UI with React.js and building robust server-side infrastructure with Node.js and Express.js. Proficient in integrating designs for optimal UX, implementing CRUD operations, data validation, and route management. Skilled in MongoDB database management, designing schemas, and optimizing queries for efficiency. My expertise enables me to create dynamic and efficient web applications meeting functional and aesthetic standards.
